Privacy Policy

In the case of the product not as described in the Application, then with in 2 days of you receiving the product you can request a Replacement / Exchange at no extra cost.

In the case of the product is damaged, contact must be made with in 24 hours of receipt of the products by email to ms.mobileworld07@gmail.com notifying us of any damage to the product and contact to the application messages service and give us photos of product. Upon return, the article will undergo a quality control check to ensure the quality problem is found to be our responsibility rather than misuse or abuse of the product outside of our control. Once the returned product passes the quality control check to ensure it is unused and in its original packaging stage, an Replacement will be dispatched. Products should returned in their original packaging (where possible). in case of damaged or faulty product, to qualify for refund you need to send the product to MS MOBILE WORLD with your own expenses, once we receive your item/product, We will inspect it and notify you on the status of your refund after inspecting the item. Product should be unused and in the same package that you received the product, otherwise refund or replacement will be rejected.

Use of product or Physical defect by customer will not be refunded or replaced by MS MOBILE WORLD.

No returns are accepted, once the product is replaced to exchanged from our end Returns / Replacement / Refunds are not applicable for the products that are purchased under sale, sale products are final sale only

For prepaid orders we offer refund on your paid amount and for COD orders we deduct 20% as handling expenses. Refund can take up to 5-7 working days to reflect in your account statement depending on your bank.
